backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blink rates, vibration events, blink summaries, and user profiles with access control and ownership filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking planned feature changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains predefined summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router routes and wraps the app in the BluetoothProvider and AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/actor/ActorBoots: Deprecated wrapper component that simply renders its children without actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login landing screen using Internet Identity with branding, CTA, and hero section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Canvas‑based blink‑rate history chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkSumm: Empty placeholder file for blink summary history chart.
frontend/src/components/charts/Vibration: Empty file intended for vibration events chart implementation.
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: Device selection card that lets users input a device ID and navigate to device management.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: Displays API usage examples with JS and cURL tabs and supports copying code snippets.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with links to dashboard, devices, API docs, and smoke test.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Deprecated dialog for entering a user name; remains but is never shown.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: Card component showing live alertness state and enabling generation of personalized sleep schedules.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: Card with a dropdown for selecting predefined data time ranges and computing timestamps.
frontend/src/contexts/BluetoothContext.t: Bluetooth provider managing BLE connections, NUS notifications, parsing sensor data, and blink detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrap.ts: Deprecated hook that previously initialized the actor but now performs no operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useBleWriteQueue.ts: Deprecated hook providing a no-op BLE write queue interface.
Deprecated hook stub for blink summary flushing with no backend actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook to fetch the current user profile via the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Manages a device ID with localStorage persistence and validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: Provides BLE connection management, notification handling, and blink‑rate parsing for EyeR devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
Tracks and persists blink‑rate history in localStorage with pruning and save timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with react‑query hooks for fetching and mutating blink data and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useRollingBlinkRateAv: Maintains a 5‑minute rolling window of blink data and computes its average.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionBlinkRateHi: Stores a short, in‑memory session blink‑rate history capped at 100 points.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark UI themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing live blink data, charts, rolling averages, history, and schedule generation logic.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: UI for connecting to a Bluetooth device, handling custom UUIDs, auto-discovery, and tracking live blink rate updates.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Documentation page describing the telemetry ingestion API and required data fields for ESP32-C3 device uploads.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeTest.tsx: Runs a frontend-to-backend connectivity test using the actor and Internet Identity, reporting pass/fail status.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Web Bluetooth GATT interfaces, services, characteristics, and request options.
frontend/src/utils/bleNus.ts: Utility functions for parsing Nordic UART Service notifications and legacy heart-rate style blink rate data.
frontend/src/utils/bleUuid.ts: Normalizes and formats BLE UUIDs for Web Bluetooth compatibility and display.
frontend/src/utils/bleWriteQueue.ts: LocalStorage-backed queue for storing unsent blink rate data with helpers to add, remove, and clear entries.
frontend/src/utils/localSleepSchedule.ts: Analyzes the last 100 blink-rate data points to compute average BPM and generate sleep and alertness recommendations.
frontend/src/utils/personalizedSleepSche: Maps rolling average BPM to an alertness state and returns corresponding work/rest schedule plans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to recalibrating eye open/closed detection thresholds.
